property.name: Card Text
property.value:
COST: Pick a number for X, where X is less than or equal to the number of [O] you control.
EFFECT: Destroy all characters with X strength.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: from whence you came

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
COST: Pick a resource you control. (You can pick face-down resources.)
EFFECT: Put the resource into your hand. Draw a card.
FLIP UP: 1 [O][O] and play a resource.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: quite the showman ·"I have a reputation to live up to. If my show does not make people vomit, and have an erection at the same time, then I've let my audience down.·

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
UNIQUE Hextilda
TOIL AND TROUBLE COST: Pay 4. Deplete this card. Pick a card you control with at least 1 token on it. EFFECT: Double the number of tokens on the card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: i’ve been wanting one with a beard …I like to be tickled…just a bit…just a bit…

property.name: Subtype
property.value: insect, monstrosity

property.name: Card Text
property.value: HIDEOUSLY HORRENDOUS HEX OF HELLISHLY HORRIFYING HATRED COST: Pay 6. Destroy this card. Pick 6 characters. EFFECT: Inflict 6 damage to each of the characters. Inflict 6 damage to all factions. Both players remove 6 cards in their hand from the game. Both players remove 6 cards in their discard pile from the game. Both players remove the top 6 cards of their deck from the game.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: original Open R&D concept by kallisti You don't want to know what the sixth effect is.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: TICKLE COST: Pay 1. Deplete this card. EFFECT: Your opponent discards a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: what's that over there? ·"Coochie, coochie, COO!·

property.name: Card Text
property.value: PRESENT THE STAFF COST: Pay 2. Deplete this card. Pick a character you control. EFFECT: Put the character into its owner's hand if you can. If you do, X is its numeric cost. You may search your deck for a tactic with numeric cost X or less and reveal it. If you do, put it into your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: you want it to be one way. but it’s the other way.

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
COST: Reveal a face-down tactic you control. EFFECT: You may play the tactic. Draw a card.
While this card is in your discard pile, if a card that provides at least [O] enters play under your control, you may pay 2. If you do, put this card into play under your control as a face-down resource.
FLIP UP: 1 [O]

property.name: Flavor
property.value: we are the weavers of shadowy phantasms

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
If a player draws any number of cards, that player may add or remove a token from this card. If they do, generate the effect which corresponds to the new number of tokens on this card:
0 TOKENS: That player's opponent discards a card. 1 TOKEN: That player may look at the top 2 cards of their deck. If they do, they put 1 into their hand and 1 on the bottom of their deck. 2 TOKENS: That player may pick a character or location. If they do, put it into its owner’s hand. AT LEAST 3 TOKENS: That player may play a resource.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: with herb stuffed radicchio

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
COVERT
PROVIDES: [O]

property.name: Flavor
property.value: salad isn’t the only thing you’ll be tossing A dead dog in a gnarled old tree. Decapitated orphan. Spiral staircase, evil queen, scarecrows, spiders, pumpkins, clowns.

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
COST: Play this only in response to a tactic being played. Pay X, where X is its numeric cost.
EFFECT: Duplicate the tactic. Terminate the tactic.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: original Open R&D concept by flowing_deep_suns & koikaze

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
COVERT
If you played this card using FLIP UP, it enters play with a token on it.
While there is a token on this card, it loses Covert and gains 1 strength and 1 life.
If there are no tokens on this card and it's destroyed, flip it face-down under its owner's control instead.
FLIP UP: 3 [O][O]

property.name: Flavor
property.value: that’s not water

property.name: Card Text
property.value: GAZE UPON THE "STARS" COST: Deplete this card. EFFECT: You may play a tactic with numeric cost X or less for free, where X is either 5 or the number of [O] you control, whichever is lower.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: your "moons" are in apex ·"When are women going to learn? Every plural noun means boobs.·

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Draw a card. Put a card from your hand on the bottom of your deck. Put this card into play under its owner's control as a face-down resource instead of into their discard pile.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: not to be confused with "flossing the otter·

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Look at your opponent's hand and pick a non-resource card in it. Your opponent discards that card. You may pick a card of the same type as the discarded card. If you do, put it into its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: that’s starting to get annoying

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
COST: Pick a character.
EFFECT: If you played this card using FLIP UP, your opponent discards 2 cards. Then, if your opponent has 3 or fewer cards in their hand, remove the character from the game.
FLIP UP: 5 [O][O]

property.name: Flavor
property.value: it’s better than turning into a rooster, or a guy named Richard

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
Your opponent discards a card. If you control [O][O][O], your opponent discards another card. If you control [O][O][O][O][O][O][O][O], your opponent discards another card.
FLIP UP: 2 [O]

property.name: Flavor
property.value: monkey see…monkey do… ...monkey pee all over you!

property.name: Card Text
property.value: If a card that provides at least [O] enters play under your control, you may pick a character. If you do, it gains Covert this turn.

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
At the end of your turn, put a token on this card. Your faction loses X influence, where X is the number of tokens on this card. You may play a resource.
At the start of each turn, if there are at least 3 tokens on this card, your opponent takes control of it. Remove all tokens from this card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: repository of self deprecation

property.name: Card Text
property.value: At the end of each turn, put the character with the lowest numeric cost into its owner's hand. If there is a tie, you decide which character is affected.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: now with cream filling!

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
While this card is in your hand you may reveal this card as you are playing a resource. If you do, you may play this card for 1.
When this card enters play, you may put a resource you control into its owner's hand. If you do, you may play a resource.

UNIQUE Gloamspike
All your face-down tactics gain FLIP UP with numeric cost and threshold equal to their regular numeric cost and threshold.

property.value:
COST: Pick a character.
EFFECT: Flip the character face-down under its owner's control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: “what was his name again?… Jean-Luc!” [LangA]That's right motherfucker. I quoted a shitty coffee commercial and there's nothing you can do about it cocksucker. Piss, cunt, tits. Sweet, that's all seven words. Writing in code is cool.

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
RUNE OF ENHANCEMENT COST: Destroy this card. Pick a character. EFFECT: This turn, the character gains 2 strength and 2 life.
RUNE OF SUMMONING COST: Destroy this card. EFFECT: Put 2 Micromajig tokens into play under your control.
RUNE OF ANIMATION COST: Destroy this card. Pick an item. EFFECT: This turn, the item is a "golem" character with strength and life equal to its numeric cost and 3 speed.
RUNE OF ACCELERATION COST: Destroy this card. EFFECT: Search your deck for a card named "Elitism" and put it into play. If you do, at the end of the turn destroy a card named "Elitism" you control.
RUNE OF OVERCLOCKING COST: Destroy this card. Pick a Gearsmith card you control. EFFECT: Put a token on the card.
RUNE OF DESTRUCTION COST: Destroy this card. Pick an item. EFFECT: Remove the item from the game.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: INNOVATE COST: Pay 1. Discard a card. EFFECT: If the discarded card is a resource, search your deck for a location. If it is a location, search your deck for a character. If it is a character, search your deck for a tactic. If it is a tactic, search your deck for an item. If it is an item, search your deck for a resource. Reveal the card you searched for and put it into your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: “i’m finished!”

property.name: Card Text
property.value: You may search your opponent’s deck for a card. If you do, remove it from the game face-down. For the rest of the game, if your opponent plays a card, you may reveal the removed card if it has the same name. If you do, you may play it for free even if you cannot meet its threshold and terminate your opponent’s card. (Playing a resource does not trigger this effect.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: original Open R&D concept by Lioge Don’t trust anyone. Not even yourself.

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
When this card enters play, draw a card.
If this card is destroyed, both players remove the top card of their deck from the game instead. If the numeric cost of your removed card is greater than or equal to the numeric cost of your opponent's, draw a card and reduce the amount of damage inflicted to this card this turn to 0. Otherwise, remove this card from the game.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: and that was without a single drop of rum

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
COST: Play this only in response to a card or ability that picked a character as an extra cost. Pick another character that can be picked by that card or ability.
EFFECT: When the card or ability resolves, its effect happens as though your opponent had picked the other character instead.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: MUSTACHE SHOWDOWN COST: Deplete this card. EFFECT: Both players look at the top 3 cards of their deck and divide them into 2 face-down piles containing at least 1 card each. Both players choose one of their opponent’s piles. Reveal the chosen piles. If one pile has a higher total numeric cost than the other, the owner of that pile may put one of the cards from it into their hand. Shuffle the remaining cards into their owner’s deck.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: original Open R&D concept by Nurgleprobe Luxurious facial hair is no laughing matter.

You may include as many copies of this card in your deck as you want.

card.name: Rosy Palmer, and Her Five Friends

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
UNIQUE Rosy
If this card is destroyed, reveal the top 5 cards of your opponent's deck. You may choose a revealed character. If you do, put it into play under your control. Your opponent puts the remaining cards on the bottom of their deck in any order.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: ·"There is worse things than 4 naked ladies at the same time…" – Hans

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
At the end of your turn, put a token on this card.
JIGGLE JIGGLE COST: Pay 2. EFFECT: Put a token on this card.
TANTALIZE COST: Pick a character with numeric cost X or less, where X is the number of tokens on this card. Destroy this card. EFFECT: Take control of the character.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: “is it my birthday?”

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
ATTACH to Character
The attached character gains 1 strength and 1 life.
If this card is destroyed, flip it face-down under its owner's control instead.
FLIP UP: 1 [D]

property.name: Flavor
property.value: the perfect tool for mining…your face!

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
COST: Pick a character. Both players remove the top card of their deck from the game. X is the numeric cost of your opponent's removed card minus the numeric cost of your removed card.
EFFECT: This turn, the character loses X life. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: that’s how i want to go

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
COST: Pick a character.
EFFECT: This turn, the character gains 1 speed. Put this card into play under its owner's control as a face-down resource instead of into their discard pile.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: she was hot. it would have been wrong not to hit it. You don’t plan sincerity, you’ve gotta make it up on the spot.

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
At the start of your turn, you may put a token on this card.
This card gains 1 speed for each token on it.
While there are at least 5 tokens on this card, it's unblockable.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: ·"don't make me hate poop…even more…·

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
YOU KNOW YOU WANT TO... COST: Use this only 5 times each turn. Pay 1. Inflict 1 damage to your faction. EFFECT: Draw a card. At the end of the turn, put a token on this card and your opponent takes control of it.
SWEET RELEASE COST: Pay 2. Remove a token from this card. EFFECT: You may play a resource.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: “over 1 million served” ·"I'll be done in a minute!·

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
UNIQUE Crest
PROVIDES: [D][D]
If a card that provides at least [D] enters play under your control, you may pick a character. If you do, that character loses 1 life this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: original Open R&D concept by Kragt & Great White Nothing

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
UNIQUE Crest
PROVIDES: [E][E]
If a card that provides at least [E] enters play under your control, you may put a Micromajig token into play under your control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: original Open R&D concept by Kragt & Great White Nothing

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
UNIQUE Crest
PROVIDES: [G][G]
If a card that provides at least [G] enters play under your control, you may pick a faction. If you do, it gains 2 influence.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: original Open R&D concept by Kragt & Great White Nothing

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
UNIQUE Crest
PROVIDES: [O][O]
If a card that provides at least [O] enters play under your control, you may search your deck for a tactic and reveal it. If you do, put it on top of your deck.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: original Open R&D concept by Kragt & Great White Nothing

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
UNIQUE Crest
PROVIDES: [R][R]
If a card that provides at least [R] enters play under your control, you may search your deck for a character and reveal it. If you do, put it on top of your deck.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: original Open R&D concept by Kragt & Great White Nothing

property.name: Card Text
property.value: If you played this card in response to a tactic, terminate that tactic. Put that tactic into play under its owner's control as a face-down resource instead of into their discard pile.

property.value: original Open R&D card name by jedibcg

property.value:
Inflict 1 damage to all characters.
FLIP UP: 3 [R][R] and play a resource.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: it’s not poison. it’s got juice in it.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: COST: Pay X, where X is 7 minus the number of [R] you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: ancient yet vigorous [LangA]Like your grandpa on his blue pill.

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
If a card that provides at least [R] enters play under your control, put a token on this card.
This card gains 1 strength for each token on it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: tonight we dine in hell Or maybe Arby’s.

property.name: Subtype
property.value: athalamund, sword of great justice

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
UNIQUE Athalamund
PUNCH COST: Pay 1. Deplete this card. Pick a character. X is its strength. Y is twice this card’s strength. EFFECT: Inflict X damage to this card. Inflict Y damage to the character.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: original Open R&D concept by w4r10rd

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
COST: Choose a number for X. Pay X+X. Pick 2 or fewer characters.
EFFECT: This turn, the characters gain X strength and X life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: the higher, the fewer.

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
You may play this card whenever you could play a tactic.
COST: Pick a location you control.
While the picked location is in play, this card cannot attack or block.
FLIP UP: 2 [R][R]

property.name: Flavor
property.value: original Open R&D concept by kallisti Destroying his home was a BIG mistake.

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
COST: Pick a non-resource card in your discard pile. EFFECT: You may play the card. Draw a card.
FLIP UP: 2 [R]

property.value:

[R][R][R][R][R][R][R][R][R]: This card gains 4 life.

property.value: PROVIDES: [R]

property.name: Flavor
property.value: uh…my therapist thinks it will help…i have a note. [LangA]This house is a fucking prison on planet bullshit in the galaxy of this sucks camel dicks

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
COST: Choose a number for X. Destroy X characters you control.
EFFECT: If your opponent controls at least X characters, they destroy X characters they control. Otherwise, destroy all your opponent's characters. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: whoa! i can see my house. gnarly.

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
COST: Reveal a face-down resource card you control. X is its numeric cost. Destroy it. Pick a character or location.
EFFECT: Inflict X damage to the character or location. Put this card into play under its owner's control as a face-down resource instead of into their discard pile.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: two great tastes that taste great together

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
AMBUSH COST: Pick an attacking character. EFFECT: Inflict 2 damage to the character. Flip this card face-down under its owner's control.

property.value: only 50% effective on non-midgets

property.name: Card Text
property.value: If battle damage is inflicted to a character in a party with this card, reduce the amount by 1. (This includes this character.)

property.value: original Open R&D concept by kallisti

property.value: padamose, emperor, mau

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
UNIQUE Padamose
All your “sword of great justice” characters gain 1 strength and 1 life.
All your opponent’s “mau” characters and Arcanist characters lose 1 strength and 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: original Open R&D concept by w4r10rd [LangA]"P" to the "E" to the "M". Recognize!

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
When this card enters play, you may pick an item. If you do, destroy that item and your faction loses 2 influence.
FLY AWAY COST: Remove an item in your opponent's discard pile from the game. EFFECT: Flip this card face-down under its owner's control.
FLIP UP: 3 [R][R]

property.name: Flavor
property.value: if meat’s bad for you, then how come it’s food?

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
This card enters play with 3 tokens on it.
At the start of your turn, remove a token from this card. If there are no tokens on it, destroy it.
At the end of your turn, you may pick a character. If you do, inflict X damage to that character, where X is the number of tokens on this card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: first the slaughter. then the pie.

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
If this card attacks, inflict 1 damage to your opponent's faction.
[R][R][R][R]: If this card attacks, you may pick a character. If you do, inflict 1 damage to it.

property.value: fort infiltration win

property.value: If this card is destroyed, flip it face-down under its owner's control instead.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: i also write poetry Haikus are easy, But sometimes they don't make sense. Refrigerator.

property.name: Subtype
property.value: emperor barduse, dragon

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
UNIQUE Emperor Barduse
When this card enters play, you may pick any number of characters. If you do, inflict X damage divided however you want to the characters, where X is twice the number of "dragon" characters you control.
All your other “dragon” characters gain 1 strength and 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: original Open R&D concept by w4r10rd There are only those with power, and those too weak to seek it.

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
ATTACH to Character
The attached character gains 2 strength and 1 life.
If this card is destroyed, flip it face-down under its owner's control instead.
SNICKER SNACK COST: Use this only while this card is a face-down resource. Reveal this card. Pay 3. Discard a card. Pick a character. EFFECT: Inflict 2 damage to the character. Inflict 1 damage to your faction.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: original Open R&D card name by thegnomishone
